name: Reader Rabbit - 2nd Grade
description:
Ambused by pirates, Reader Rabbit and Sam the Lion must race to the top
of Mt. Cheesemore to recover the Dreamship before the pirates do! Can
you help them? Multiple difficulty levels for each mini-game that can
be changed at any time. Full video cutscenes and voice acting
throughout the game. *Simple controls using the Wii Remote.

Educational mini-games designed to teach basic 2nd Grade skills,
including Language Arts, Science, Problem Solving, Math & Creative
Exploration & Expression.
